objects.specification: A wide flat rectangular floor panel with a smooth, neutral-tone surface made to support all booth elements. It has a subtle beveled edge and a slightly raised platform appearance, providing a clean and professional foundation for the demo area. The finish is matte and slip-resistant to ensure safe walking and staging of exhibits.

A large vertical wall panel in a neutral light-gray tone, with a smooth surface finish and clean straight edges. The wall is designed to enclose the back of the booth, providing privacy and a backdrop for lighting effects. Its height and uniform color ensure a cohesive and professional exhibition space.

A left-side vertical wall panel finished in a neutral tone, featuring a smooth matte surface and precise edges. It serves as one of the side boundaries of the booth, supporting lighting mounts or signage attachments. The panel height matches the surrounding walls for a seamless enclosure.

A right-side vertical wall panel with a neutral finish, exhibiting a sleek, untextured surface and sharp corners. This panel completes the booth’s enclosure and provides a clean surface for mounting promotional materials or decorative elements.

A front-facing vertical wall panel in a soft neutral gray, featuring a door-sized opening for entry. The wall has a smooth, matte surface designed to complement graphic displays and lighting accents. It provides the main facade and frames the entrance.

A cleanly cut rectangular entrance opening within the front wall, sized for comfortable human access. The edges are smooth and slightly rounded for safety, and the opening is framed to highlight the transition between open space and enclosed booth area.

A sleek modern demo car model with realistic proportions and smooth aerodynamic curves. The surface finish is glossy metallic, reflecting booth lighting to highlight design details. It features stylized wheels, tinted windows, and brand-specific accents for an authentic showroom presentation.

A large rectangular display stand with smooth edges and a modern minimalistic design. The front face is a vibrant brand color for visual emphasis, while the body is constructed from lightweight composite materials. It is sized to present informational panels, brochures, or digital screens.

A customer reception desk with a streamlined modern profile, featuring a smooth front panel in brand color and a neutral-toned countertop. The desk has integrated cable routing and subtle accent lighting below the surface. It provides a welcoming station for staff interaction.

A comfortable ergonomic chair with padded seat and backrest, featuring a durable fabric in brand color. The chair has clean lines, a sturdy metal frame, and a slightly reclined posture for staff comfort during extended use.

A comfortable ergonomic chair with padded seat and backrest, featuring a durable fabric in brand color. The chair has clean lines, a sturdy metal frame, and a slightly reclined posture for staff comfort during extended use.

A guest seating chair with a modern silhouette, featuring a contoured seat, supportive backrest, and metal legs. Upholstered in brand-colored fabric, it offers a balance of comfort and style for visitor engagement.

A tall vertical fabric banner in vivid brand colors, featuring high-resolution promotional graphics. The banner is mounted on a slim pole bracket and has a tensioned surface for a wrinkle-free appearance. It is designed to catch visitor attention near the entrance.

A stage spotlight fixture with a compact cylindrical housing in matte black finish. It features an adjustable bracket for precise aiming and a high-intensity beam to highlight focal elements. The fixture includes integrated cooling vents and a gold-colored trim ring.

A decorative potted plant with vibrant green foliage and a tapered ceramic pot. The leaves are lush and varied in size, creating a natural accent. The pot has a matte white finish and sits on a small circular saucer to catch excess water.

A promotional signage stand with a slender metal frame and a printed panel surface. The graphic panel displays brand messaging in bold colors, and the stand base is weighted for stability. The overall design is sleek and unobtrusive.
